sentences.english: Long dress in green and white striped seersucker.
Blown girl hair short skirt, Xiao Ling Tong shoes thin clothing.
sentences.chinese: 吹得女孩儿发长裙短，小龄童衣单鞋薄。

sentences.english: At last she chose a rosy dress to the party.
sentences.chinese: 她最后穿着一条玫瑰紫的长裙参加了晚宴。

sentences.english: She always prims her up in an old-fashioned gown.
sentences.chinese: 她总是整洁地穿着一件老式长裙。

sentences.english: Her long skirt was trailing along the floor.
The material was made into an ankle-length long dress, which looked very good.
sentences.chinese: 那块布料被制成一条拖到脚的长裙，很好看。

sentences.english: pale sky-blue velvet bride choose the Formal Gowns made??, showing fresh, beautiful dress style.
sentences.chinese: 身着淡天蓝色天鹅绒长裙的新娘会显得清新美丽。

sentences.english: She had abandoned her jeans and T-shirts for long skirts and a headscarf .
sentences.chinese: 她为了长裙和头巾已经放弃了牛仔和T恤衫。

sentences.english: She wears a pea green full-length skirt, which makes her look very lovely.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条豆青色的长裙，显得十分活泼。

sentences.english: In the early 18th century, aristocracies began to wear western-style clothes.
sentences.chinese: 18世纪初，贵族们开始穿西服，妇女穿软直纹长裙。

sentences.english: The Tajik people wear sleeveless jackets, log skirts and riding boots.
sentences.chinese: 塔吉克人喜穿坎肩，长裙，马靴。

sentences.english: It is most often made of woolen cloth in a tartan pattern.
sentences.chinese: 大部分苏格兰长裙由带格子图案的呢绒制成。

sentences.english: Don't know while, he silently drew behind dragging of her long skirt lock.
sentences.chinese: 不知何时，他悄悄拉开了她长裙的拉锁。

sentences.english: She wore a white satin gown trimmed with lace.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条饰有蕾丝花边的白色缎子长裙。

sentences.english: This iconic garment has been described as the ultimate little black dress.
sentences.chinese: 这件偶像化的服饰被誉为终极黑色长裙。

definition: old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
woman's suit/dress worn over a petticoat
